title: Is The Games Industry Ready For Next-Gen? | The Escapist Show
description:
Join our YouTube Membership program for Early Access to videos, badges, emojis, bonus content and more. ►► https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCqg5FCR7NrpvlBWMXdt-5Vg/join

This week on The Escapist Show we discuss whether or not the industry is actually ready for next-gen due to the pandemic and games in general not being ready.

Timestamps
The games we've been playing 0:00 - 16:04
Is the industry ready for next-gen? 16:05 - 28:36
